column2: ENGLISH

As the [Root.Religion.GetName] mystics surround me, preparing my body and mind for the ritual, one of them asks me what do I wish to do with the power bestowed to me by [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
May [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] protect me and my Fellowship!
Enter Battle Trance
Enables a decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu for §YLodge§! rulers to enter a battle trance for a limited time, increasing their military skills.

The Aztecs must have invaded
Is member of a non-Pagan Warrior Lodge
WS (Warrior Societies)
Players only
Preexisting
§ZWS:§! Christian Warrior Lodge
Only players can form the §BChristian§! Warrior Society.
Both players and the AI can form the §BChristian§! Warrior Society.
Neither players nor the AI can form the §BChristian§! Warrior Society.
§BChristian§! Warrior Society is already active at game start, as long as non-heretic §BChristians§! are present at start date.

Neither players nor the AI can form the §BMazdan§! Warrior Society.
§BMazdan§! Warrior Society is already active at game start, as long as non-heretic §BMazdans§! are present at start date.
